nodes.text: Are you still worried about the Disbarred Bard test? Katie's right - it's not worth it. Relax, enjoy yourself.
You understand the lessons in class. You'll do better next time. So why are you taking this so hard?
I understand vhat the Master says, but it is hard to read what he writes. Is like he writes in Germanish.
Hey, I agree - it's always hard to understand Master von Urwald - especially with his writing. I had a hard time reading the test, too.
I'll see what I can do to help you pass the next test.
Thank you, Shawn. I vill also try very hard to study so I know my lessons.
I have alvays been a good learner. I tried very hard to do vell on the test, but I failed. I do not vant to fail again.
I talked it over with Thomas, and he's working on a solution to your problem. You should talk to him about it.
I vill do so, thanks!
I have alvays been a good learner. I tried very hard to do vell on the test, but I failed. I do not vant to fail again.
Thomas has said that he vill tutor me on the test, now that you have talked to him about it. You are a good friend, Shawn.
Look, don't just fret and worry about talking it over with the Master. It's better to do something and get it over with. Besides, I think the Master likes it when people stand up for themselves.
After all, it would be a shame if you let a little thing like a test get in the way of you becoming the Rogue of the Year... I could use the competition.
Okay, I vould not vant you to vin Rogue of Year vithout a challenge...
Don't worry - I'll find some way to make sure you don't fail the next test. Trust me.
Ve vill see.
Why don't you, Katie, and I go over to the card table and you can show us some of those card tricks you can do? You have the fastest hands I've ever seen. It will be fun to see what you can do.
Hey, it beats moping. Maybe you can teach us a card trick or two.
I can do that... is easy!

nodes.message: Adding audovisual cues, since a significant amount of time passes here.

nodes.text: Easy for you, maybe...
Thanks for showing us those tricks. You are very talented.
I vill be happy to show you other vays that peoples cheat at cards. My People are very good at spotting frauds because ve know vhat to look for.
Yeah, it wouldn't surprise me if certain people in this room right now regularly cheat at Poobah.
Sosi, he is not good enough to cheat. Kyro, he is very good. Ve should all vatch him carefully.

Do you know why we were picked to be in the Disbarred Bards class? Not because we're sneaky or shifty or dumb, but because we are smart. We don't have a big sword or a magic staff to win a fight - we can outwit our opponents.
So instead of worrying about failing, you should be figuring out how not to fail. You have the brains and the skills - now all you have to do is use them.
You are right, Shawn. I vill have to find a vay not to fail. Is just that I don't know how right now.
Right now, I do not feel very smart. I feel very stupid.
You don't have to worry about the next test. You just have to think like a Rogue.
When in doubt - Cheat. Watch to see what Thomas or Katie answers on the test. Sosi and Kyro are cheating. Why not you?
But cheating is wrong.
Is it? This is the Disbarred Bards class. It isn't a crime to cheat. It's only a crime to get caught cheating.
I don't think Esme's in the mood to flirt right now.
I'll see you tomorrow!
Good night, Shawn. Thank you for trying to help me.

nodes.message: This looks like an old version: if you talk to Gerhard, he'll tell Shawn that Esme needs to speak to him herself. Shawn should instead be telling Esme to talk to Gerhard, not telling her to wait and let her talk to him.

nodes.text: I talked to Master von Urwald about the problem you had with the test...
No! Vhy vould you do that? He must think I am stupid.
Actually, I think he'll try to help you with this. He's not as scary as he seems.
I hope you are right. He is very scary.
